2073309.productTitle: Performax® Emergency Tool and Tire Gauge
2073309.shortDescription: Performax® Emergency Tool and Tire Gauge
2073309.longDescription: The Performax Emergency Tool and Tire Gauge includes a digital tire gauge, flashlight, LED map light, emergency hammer and seatbelt cutter. Stay safe and keep your glove box organized with this all-in-one traveling companion.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: Includes a digital readout tire gauge, flashlight, LED map light, emergency hammer and seatbelt cutter all in one tool

2614132.longDescription: This Pneumatic Roller Seat makes a great addition to your shop or garage. This seat features wheels and a comfortable foam red padded seat. The handy tool tray under the seat is perfect for keeping your tools or small parts.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Foam padded seat provides maximum comfort
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Large tool tray under seat holds tools and small parts
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Height adjust from 16" to 20"

2452213.longDescription: The Stanley 3-piece Sortmaster Organizer brings the whole Sortmaster family together. This set makes a perfect gift and includes the Sortmaster, Sortmaster Light, and Sortmaster Junior.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Locking latches for easy transport
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Sortmaster Light Dimensions: 11.5"L x 8.5"W x 2.5"H

2431902.longDescription: Hang your pictures with ease with this handy kit from Stanley! The Stanley 3-Piece Household Tool Kit includes (1) 16' Leverlock Tape Measure, (1) Stud Sensor 50 and (1) Torpedo Level.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: Stud sensor detects wood/metal up to 3/4" depth
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Stud sensor requires 9-volt battery (sold separately)
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: Torpedo level features 360-degree vials for readability
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint4: Tape measure features push-release self-locking mechanism
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: High-impact ABS case with durable rubber
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Corrosion-resistant Tru-zero end hook for accurate measurements

2611600.longDescription: The Snap-on® 1650 PSI Electric Pressure Washer with universal motor comes with a 25' High Pressure hose and hose reel.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: 1.2 GPM
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: 25' high pressure hose
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Built-in detergent tank

2372173.longDescription: The Stanley 16-piece screwdriver set includes (6) slotted, (4) Phillips and (6) precision screwdrivers all with cushioned grips for maximum comfort.  The variety of screwdrivers in this set makes it a great addition to your shop or garage.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Phillips sizes: 3" x #1, 4" x #2, 1-3/4" x #2 and 6" x #3
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: Precision sizes: 1.4mm slotted, 2mm slotted, 2.4mm slotted, 3mm slotted, #0 phillips, #1 phillips

2371593.longDescription: The Stanley 4-piece LeverLock® Tape Measure set includes (2) 12' tape measures, (1) 16' tape measure and (1) 25' tape measure. All of the tape measures have a push release locking mechanism for controlled blade retraction.

2375372.longDescription: This 3-piece Woodworking Chisel Set from Irwin is made of solid-forged chrome vanadium steel blade for maximum edge retention. This chisel set is a great addition to any tool set or shop.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: Long blade and polypropylene handle for increased leverage
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Best suited for hand or mallet work

2441697.longDescription: This Channellock© 2-piece straight jaw pliers set is made of high-carbon steel for superior performance. The undercut tongue and groove design won't slip like other pliers.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Made in the USA

2445455.productTitle: Wises Wiss Multimaster Snip & Folding Utility Knife Set
2445455.shortDescription: Wises Wiss Multimaster Snip & Folding Utility Knife Set
2445455.longDescription: Wiss Multimaster Snip & Folding Utility Knife Set features a Wiss long cut utility snip that's great for making long fast cuts in sheet metal, aluminum and much more.  The set also includes Wiss quick change folding utility knife featuring soft grip ergonomic handle, quick blade change and easy folding handle for compact storage.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: Snip and knife both feature non slip textured grips
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Snip combines long cut of tinners snip with strength of compound action
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: Snip cuts up to 20 gauge low carbon steel
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint4: Knife features quick blade change for easy and fast replacement
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Knife accepts all standard types of utility knife blades
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Knife features well-positioned folding lock keeping hands out of the blades path

2446021.longDescription: Crescent 6" & 10" Adjustable Wrench Set features wide capacity jaws allowing each wrench to work with more fastener sizes. Both wrenches feature a polished head and wider, satin-finished handles to provide more comfort and less stress to the hand.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Laser-etched scale provides quick way to determine fastener size
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint4: Chrome-plated finish resists rust and corrosion

specifications.Jaw Capacity (in.): 6" wrench: 15/16" Jaw capacity; 10" Wrench: 1-5/16" Jaw Capacity
specifications.Handle Style: Wider handle for more comfortable use

2370496.productTitle: GearWrench® 7 Piece SAE Flex Head Ratcheting Wrench Set
2370496.shortDescription: GearWrench® 7 Piece SAE Flex Head Ratcheting Wrench Set
2370496.longDescription: This 7-piece wrench set from GearWrench includes 3/8", 7/16", ½", 9/16", 5/8", 11/16" and ¾" flex head SAE combination ratcheting wrenches. This set of wrenches makes it quicker and easier to get the job done.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: Flexible ratcheting head makes it easy to get into tight spaces
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Ratcheting box end needs as little as 5 degrees to move fastener vs. 30 degrees for Standard box end wrenches
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: Surface Drive Plus provides a stronger grip on fasteners, reduces fastener rounding, and delivers up to 25% more torque
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint4: Small ratcheting box end design allows access to tight spots where a ratchet and socket, or a conventional ratcheting box end wrench will not fit
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: High quality chrome finish for long lasting precision use
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Professional quality hand tools make most jobs easier and faster and will last a lifetime

specifications.Wrench Sizes: 7 Piece set includes 3/8, 7/16, 1/2, 9/16, 5/8, 11/16 & 3/4 Flex SAE Combination Ratcheting Wrenches

2370506.productTitle: GearWrench® 7 Piece Metric Flex Head Ratcheting Wrench Set
2370506.shortDescription: GearWrench® 7 Piece Metric Flex Head Ratcheting Wrench Set
2370506.longDescription: This 7-piece wrench set from GearWrench includes 10mm, 12mm, 13mm, 14mm, 15mm, 17mm and 19mm flex head combination ratcheting wrenches. This set features a 5-degree ratcheting arc for working in tight areas. The flex head tilts up to 180 degrees for access to confined areas. These wrenches feature Surface Drive, which provides a stronger grip on fasteners. This set of wrenches is made of high alloy steel with a chrome finish.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: Flexible ratcheting head makes it easy to get into tight spaces
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Ratcheting box end needs as little as 5 degrees to move fastener vs. 30 degrees for Standard box end wrenches
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: Surface Drive Plus provides a stronger grip on fasteners, reduces fastener rounding, and delivers up to 25% more torque
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint4: Small ratcheting box end design allows access to tight spots where a ratchet and socket, or a conventional ratcheting box end wrench will not fit
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: High quality chrome finish for long lasting precision use
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Professional quality hand tools make most jobs easier and faster and will last a lifetime

specifications.Wrench Sizes: 7 Piece set includes 10, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17 & 19 Metric Flex Combination Ratcheting Wrenches

2438136.productTitle: Performax 9 Piece SAE Combo Wrench Set
2438136.shortDescription: Performax 9 Piece SAE Combo Wrench Set
2438136.longDescription: The Performax 9-piece SAE Combination Wrench set includes the most popular standard wrench sizes used by mechanics and homeowners alike. This wrench set comes with a convenient carrying case.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Fully polished
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Made of chrome vanadium steel
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Corrosion-resistant surface

2438138.productTitle: Performax 9 Piece MM Combo Wrench Set
2438138.shortDescription: Performax 9 Piece MM Combo Wrench Set
2438138.longDescription: The Performax 9-piece Metric Combination Wrench set includes the most popular metric wrench sizes used by mechanics and homeowners alike. This wrench set comes with a convenient carrying case.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Fully polished
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Made of chrome vanadium steel
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Corrosion-resistant surface

5612781.longDescription: The HT1000 is an ideal, general purpose heat gun that is suitable for many heating applications, ranging from removing paint and old flooring, bending plastics, loosening rusted bolts or thawing frozen pipes. The heat gun produces 1200 watts and 4100 BTUs with a temperature setting of 750°F or 1000°F. The HT1000 is ideal for DIYers, homeowners, handymen or part-time contractors.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: High-impact plastic body makes it rugged and long-lasting
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Offers power output of 1200 watts and 4100 BTUs
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: 2 temperature settings to work on a variety of projects
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint4: Lightweight and easy to hold to eliminate fatigue
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Low noise design for quiet operation
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Hanging hook for safe storage during cool down
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint7: Corrosion-resistant nozzle to prevent rust from developing on the tool

2081785.longDescription: This brad nailer is ideal for installing trim, installing chair rail and crown molding, and building crafts such as picture frames. The lightweight design allows for less user fatigue and makes this durable brad nailer perfect for high-volume production applications. With this brad nailer and starter kit at your side, you are able to handle any finish work professionally.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: Quick-release nose piece for easy jam clearing
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Cast Aluminum Construction for Nailer Body
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Rubber grip handle provides greater comfort and less fatigue.
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint7: Sequential Firing security system and internal contact safety.

2402093.productTitle: Tool Shop® 15 Amp 10 in. Sliding Compound Miter Saw
2402093.shortDescription: Tool Shop® 15 Amp 10 in. Sliding Compound Miter Saw
2402093.longDescription: The Tool Shop® 10" Sliding Compound Miter Saw features a powerful 15 amp motor and dual linear ball bearings for smooth slide action. It will make cross cut up to 11-7/8" wide. It is capable of making miter cuts up to 45 degrees left or right with 9 positive miter stops and bevel cuts up to 45 degrees to the left . This saw also features an arbor lock for easy blade changes and a precision machined aluminum table top with cast aluminum base for accurate and consistent cuts. Includes a 10-Inch carbide tipped blade, hold down clamp, table extension supports and blade wrench. This user friendly saw is versatile and powerful enough to handle a variety of cuts.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint1: 15 Amp. motor operates at 5000 RPM (No load)
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: 10", 60 tooth Carbide tipped blade
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Miter Angle: Up to 45 degrees Left/Right
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Bevel cuts up to 45 degrees Left
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint8: 90 degree Cross cut 2-7/8" x 11-7/8" cutting capacity
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint9: 45 degree Miter Cut 2-7/8" x 7-7/8" cutting capacity
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint10: 45 degree Bevel Cut 1-5/8" x 11-7/8" cutting capacity
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint11: 45 degree Miter/Bevel Cut 1-5/8" x 7-7/8" cutting capacity

2403790.productTitle: Rockwell Shopseries 10" Table Saw with Stand
2403790.shortDescription: Rockwell Shopseries 10" Table Saw with Stand
2403790.longDescription: The Rockwell Shopseries™ 10" Benchtop Table Saw with Stand features a 13-amp motor with a no load speed of 4500 RPM. This table saw is lightweight, easy to transport, and has a 2 year warranty.

productBulletPoints.bulletPoint2: 13-amp power input
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint3: Cutting capacity: 3" at 90 degrees, 2-1/2" at 45 degrees
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint5: Thin-kerf tungsten carbide-tipped blade
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint6: Integrated dust collection port
productBulletPoints.bulletPoint11: Includes blade, rip fence, miter gauge and blade wrench and stand

2528199.longDescription: These Hitachi saw blades have carbide teeth for longer life. This convenient 3 pack includes (1) 40 tooth general purpose blade, (1) 60 tooth finishing blade, and (1) 80 tooth fine finishing blade.
